titles.title: District of Columbia Paperwork Reduction Act
A bill to amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to streamline the District's legislative process and conserve taxpayer dollars.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 4/10/2014--Introduced. District of Columbia Paperwork Reduction Act - Amends the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to eliminate congressional review of newly-passed District laws.
